#summary This defines a number of terms used in the Flex Time Table Application.

= Introduction =
Flex Time Table was developed initially for Walter Sisulu University by the ICT Director, Mr Courtney Walker.  The terms used are therefore associated with the University.


 * [#Academic_Block Academic Block]
 * [#Campus Campus]
 * [#Class Class]
 * [#Class_Group Class Group]
 * [#Cluster Cluster]
 * [#Offering_Type Offering Type]
 * [#Program Program]
 * [#Qualifications Qualifications]
 * [#Site Site]
 * [#Subject Subject]

==Academic Block==
The Academic Block defines the Time Block that a [#Class Class] will be held.  It is defined by the Start Week and End Week. Normally it is defined as Full Academic or Semester where semester can Semester 1 or Semester 2. The system gives flexibility to allow an Academic block to be define based on the Start week and End week. Example:

||ID||Name||Start||End||Year||	 
||1||Year||1||52||
||2||Semester 1||1||36||
||3||Semester 2||37||52||
